GravShift

By PogoBrick LLC

Featured: May 2025

Play or Learn More

An arcade style precision platformer where you Invert gravity and jump to work your way through a gauntlet of hazards, collecting coins and big bonuses.

About the Developer

Tobin has been programming since the age of 10, done 6 years in the games industry on titles such as "Jack Nicholas 4", "Civilization 2 Network Edition", and "Microsoft Casino". After years in tech, he now returns to his passion of making games as a solo indie developer.

Open Collective

Games Y'all is a meetup presented by The Museum of Human Achievement. We endeavor to celebrate, amplify, and support the unique and underrepresented within indie games and beyond.
